mapper.insert: insert into loan(id, name, agent_login_name, loaner_login_name, loaner_user_name, loaner_identity_number, type, periods, original_duration, duration, description_text, description_html, pledge_type, base_rate, loan_amount, min_invest_amount, invest_increasing_amount, max_invest_amount, activity_type, product_type, activity_rate, contract_id, fundraising_start_time, fundraising_end_time, deadline, show_on_home, created_time, created_login_name, verify_time, verify_login_name, recheck_time, recheck_login_name, status, update_time) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{agentLoginName}, #{loanerLoginName}, #{loanerUserName}, #{loanerIdentityNumber}, #{type}, #{periods}, #{originalDuration}, #{duration}, '', '', #{pledgeType}, #{baseRate}, #{loanAmount}, #{minInvestAmount}, #{investIncreasingAmount}, #{maxInvestAmount}, #{activityType}, #{productType}, #{activityRate}, #{contractId}, #{fundraisingStartTime}, #{fundraisingEndTime}, #{deadline}, #{showOnHome}, #{createdTime}, #{createdLoginName}, #{verifyTime}, #{verifyLoginName}, #{recheckTime}, #{recheckLoginName}, #{status}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select * from loan where id = #{loanId}
select * from loan where status = #{status} and product_type != 'EXPERIENCE'

select *, (select min(loan_repay.repay_date) from loan_repay where loan.id=loan_repay.loan_id and loan_repay.status in ('REPAYING', 'WAIT_PAY', 'OVERDUE')) as next_repay_date, (select sum(loan_repay.corpus) + sum(loan_repay.expected_interest) + sum(loan_repay.default_interest)+sum(loan_repay.overdue_interest) from loan_repay where loan.id=loan_repay.loan_id and loan_repay.status != 'COMPLETE' ) as unpaid_amount from loan where agent_login_name = #{agentLoginName} and status in ('REPAYING', 'WAIT_PAY', 'OVERDUE') and ( (select min(loan_repay.repay_date) from loan_repay where loan.id=loan_repay.loan_id and loan_repay.status in ('REPAYING', 'WAIT_PAY', 'OVERDUE')) between #{startTime} and #{endTime} or (select min(loan_repay.repay_date) from loan_repay where loan.id=loan_repay.loan_id and loan_repay.status = 'COMPLETE') between #{startTime} and #{endTime} ) order by next_repay_date asc, id asc limit #{index}, #{pageSize}

select *, (select max(loan_repay.actual_repay_date) from loan_repay where loan.id=loan_repay.loan_id) as completed_date, (select sum(loan_repay.corpus) + sum(loan_repay.expected_interest) + sum(loan_repay.default_interest)+sum(loan_repay.overdue_interest) from loan_repay where loan.id=loan_repay.loan_id) as expected_repay_amount, (select sum(loan_repay.corpus) + sum(loan_repay.actual_interest) from loan_repay where loan.id=loan_repay.loan_id) as actual_repay_amount from loan where agent_login_name = #{agentLoginName} and status = 'COMPLETE' and (select max(loan_repay.actual_repay_date) from loan_repay where loan.id=loan_repay.loan_id) between #{startTime} and #{endTime} order by completed_date desc, id asc limit #{index}, #{pageSize}
select count(1) from loan where agent_login_name = #{agentLoginName} and status = 'CANCEL' and recheck_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

mapper.select: select * from loan where loan.status not in ('WAITING_VERIFY', 'CANCEL') and loan.activity_type = 'NEWBIE' and loan.id != 1 order by case loan.status when 'RAISING' then 1 when 'PREHEAT' then 2 else 3 end, loan.verify_time desc, loan.id desc limit 1

select * from loan left join loan_details on loan.id = loan_details.loan_id where (loan_details.activity_desc <>'0元购' or loan_details.activity_desc is null or loan.product_type = 'EXPERIENCE') and loan.status not in ('WAITING_VERIFY', 'CANCEL') and loan.activity_type = 'NORMAL' and pledge_type in ('HOUSE', 'VEHICLE') order by case loan.status when 'RAISING' then 1 when 'PREHEAT' then 2 else 3 end, loan.verify_time desc, loan.id desc limit 0, 3

select * from loan where loan.status not in ('WAITING_VERIFY', 'CANCEL') and loan.activity_type = 'NORMAL' and pledge_type LIKE 'ENTERPRISE%' order by case loan.status when 'RAISING' then 1 when 'PREHEAT' then 2 else 3 end, loan.verify_time desc, loan.id desc limit 0, 3

SELECT * FROM loan WHERE 1=1 and loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE'

and loan.status in ('RECHECK','REPAYING','OVERDUE','COMPLETE')
and loan.activity_type <> 'NEWBIE'

and loan.product_type = #{productType}
